But the U.S. still needs to beat Ghana and have Italy do them a favor. Postgame:A stormy encounter this, full of drama and what the pundits like to call [...]

docs.snippet: The Americans moved the ball, challenged Italy's defense, and rushed back on defense.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Americans moved the ball, challenged Italy's defense, and rushed back on defense.

headline.main: Americans Flash Their Spikes and Their Pride

docs.snippet: Famous upsets in sports abound, but it is still soccer whose results are so entangled with a nation's history and sense of identity.
docs.lead_paragraph: Famous upsets in sports abound, but it is still soccer whose results are so entangled with a nation's history and sense of identity.

headline.main: Losses, and the Losing Losers Who Hate Them

docs.snippet: In a classic underdog effort, the United States kept its hopes alive in the World Cup with a redeeming and defiant performance against a three-time winner of the tournament.
docs.lead_paragraph: In a classic underdog effort, the United States kept its hopes alive in the World Cup with a redeeming and defiant performance against a three-time winner of the tournament.

headline.main: True Grit: U.S. Withstands Ejections and Italy to Stay Alive
headline.print_headline: True Grit: U.S. Withstands Ejections and Italy to Stay Alive

docs.snippet: Still unable to put on the show everyone has expected in the World Cup, Brazil got another shaky win and a spot in the second round.
docs.lead_paragraph: Still unable to put on the show everyone has expected in the World Cup, Brazil got another shaky win and a spot in the second round.

headline.main: Brazil Doesn't Dazzle, but It Gets the Job Done
headline.print_headline: Brazil Doesn't Dazzle, but It Gets the Job Done

docs.snippet: Brazil powered to a victory over Australia and reached the second round of the World Cup while only rarely looking at the top of its game.
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazil powered to a victory over Australia and reached the second round of the World Cup while only rarely looking at the top of its game.

headline.main: Against Australia, Brazil Saves Artistry for Endgame
headline.print_headline: Against Australia, Brazil Saves Artistry for Endgame

docs.snippet: Forward Brian McBride is often not the flashiest player on the field, but he is considered indispensable for the U.S. soccer team.
docs.lead_paragraph: Forward Brian McBride is often not the flashiest player on the field, but he is considered indispensable for the U.S. soccer team.

docs.snippet: Are Latin Americans going to emulate India or get addicted to China?
